Plot: A pair of aging stickup men try to get the old gang back together for one last hurrah before one of the guys takes his last assignment - to kill his comrade.
Title: Stand Up Guys
Actors: Al Pacino, Christopher Walken, Alan Arkin, Julianna Margulies
tomatoConsensus: Stand Up Guys largely wastes its talented cast in a resolutely mediocre comedy hampered by messy direction and a perfunctory script.
